mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board b join users u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board b join users u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq where b.title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from board where title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into board ( user_seq, title, content, reg_dt, read_count ) values ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0 );
